title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, generation, embeddings and tool use inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; chat history, model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI copilot that uses Ollama for inline code suggestions and shell commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat to Neovim.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-digital-assistant
summary: Voice-activated desktop assistant that pairs Ollama with Whisper and Coqui TTS for fully local conversations.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial registry mirror)
summary: Community-maintained NPM package that auto-downloads platform-specific Ollama binaries for CI/CD usage.

title: ollama-py on PyPI
summary: Official PyPI page for the ollama Python package; same codebase as ollama/ollama-python repo.

title: ollama-csharp-sdk
summary: Community C# SDK for Ollama with .NET 6+ async clients and strongly-typed chat requests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest and tokio; generate, chat and pull models from Rust.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions via Ollama with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama LLM into channels/DMs with context-aware threading and file snippets.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit chat template that connects to Ollama and showcases session state, streaming and model selection.

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian community plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm ideas and Q&A your vault using Ollama.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing new models, tools, benchmarks and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
